achievements.name: General
achievements.description: You have sought glory in ten single-player battles, fight on!

achievements.name: Centennial General
achievements.description: You have fought in one hundred single-player battles!

achievements.name: Millennial General
achievements.description: You have fought in one thousand single-player battles!  Even Alexander the Great did not have your strength of will.

achievements.name: First Victory
achievements.description: Congratulations!  You have achieved the first multi-player victory of many to come.

achievements.name: Fifty Victories
achievements.description: You have been victorious in fifty multi-player battles - you are a seasoned veteran and a worthy opponent!

achievements.name: Five Hundred Victories
achievements.description: It has probably been a long time since you stopped counting your battles and victories but your fans (and foes) will remember.  This battle marks your five hundredth multi-player victory!

achievements.name: Loyal Ally
achievements.description: On this day you have fought in your tenth online battle!  Let the town bell ring and the villagers rest from their labors that they may toast your good health and leadership.   There will be many battles ahead, some victories, some defeats - but always lessons.  Cheers and congratulations to you on this auspicious day!

achievements.name: Marking the First Hundred
achievements.description: Today is a day of glory!  You have fought one hundred battles versus fierce online opponents.  Three cheers for you - hip hip, HUZZAH!  HUZZAH!  HUZZAH!

achievements.name: Day of a Thousand Stories
achievements.description: Today is a day of great celebration!  You have fought your one thousandth battle against online opponents.  Order a feast!  Make a toast to those who have defeated you as honorable teachers, make a toast to those foes you have defeated, and most of all a toast to your friends and allies who have supported you in your many campaigns.

achievements.name: First Random Map
achievements.description: When you are ready to take on the unexpected you are ready to take on the world.  The Random map challenge is for any who are ready for attack or defense by land or sea and to defend against those who would threaten your empire.    Fight on!

achievements.name: One Hundred Random Maps
achievements.description: You are master of the random map - from the thrill of exploration, to the skillful deployment of your villages, to the razing of the enemy and driving them from your borders.  Master of continents and oceans, your leadership is the stuff of song and legend!

achievements.name: Anytime, Anywhere
achievements.description: You have fought on every type of map, against every type of opponent in history.  There may be those who will still stand against you, but they do so with respect.  Huzzah!

achievements.name: The Quickening
achievements.description: With turbo your villagers will gather and build quickly - pay attention to your resources and idle villagers. Turbo will let you focus more on your mid-game strategic planning.

achievements.name: Gathering Speed
achievements.description: Now that you have played twenty games at turbo you probably have a feel for the pace and challenges.  Focus on pushing your early attacks even earlier to surprise your enemy and interrupt their build momentum.

achievements.name: First Deathmatch
achievements.description: Deathmatch is a competition of fast decisions and instant action.  It will hone your skills at pitched battle.

achievements.name: Deathmatch Master
achievements.description: Mastery of deathmatch is the ability to continuously make good decisions while building a sustainable economy under constant attacks.  You have demonstrated that ability by playing 50 games.

achievements.name: Deathmatch Legend
achievements.description: After 300 battles if there is something to be learned in Deathmatch it is where to find opponents who will still agree to fight you.  Congratulations!

achievements.name: A Taste of History
achievements.description: Each legendary leader has something to teach you, a tactic, a strategy, or an attitude - when you have fought their battles and studied their history you are taking steps to becoming a legendary leader yourself.  Congratulations!

achievements.name: Twenty Scenarios
achievements.description: You have played your twentieth scenario, Congratulations!  What will the historians write about your battles?  Who were your greatest foes?  Were you more cunning or more bold?  Only time will tell.

achievements.name: Fifty Scenarios Completed
achievements.description: You have played fifty scenarios - Wonderful!  Each conquered world reveals more lessons and more challenges ahead.  All great leaders build their knowledge on the foundation of the stories of the legends that have gone before.   Cheers to you!

achievements.name: King of the Hill
achievements.description: It isn’t taking the hill, it is holding it against all attackers that is the ultimate challenge. You are on your way.

achievements.name: Ten Hills
achievements.description: Life is short and brutal but legend is timeless, if you can master the strategies of King of the Hill you will be better prepared to take on anything that life throws at you.  You have battled the hill ten times, this will certainly not be the last.

achievements.name: One Hundred Hills
achievements.description: You have claimed one hundred hilltops!  The victor isn’t often the first one to the top, but the one that knows how to hold it once they are there.  You have demonstrated that knowledge.  Cheers to you!

achievements.name: Peaceful Builder
achievements.description: Wonder race is an exercise in building an economy quickly and efficiently - pay attention to balancing your economy and tasking those villagers and you will be victorious.

achievements.name: Fifth Wonder Race
achievements.description: By now you know the shortest path to building a wonder quickly - and how to build up your economy in a hurry.  Focus on optimizing your gathering technologies and economy to surprise your opponents.

achievements.name: Wonder Race Mastery
achievements.description: For many, the Wonder Race is a good way to learn how to tune an economy and know the short path to the Wonder for any civilization.  For you, the Wonder Race has its own appeal - a celebration of the empire builder’s art.  Congratulations!

achievements.name: First Wonder Defense
achievements.description: Wonder Defense is an excellent way for any leader to build their skills.  If you are defending then you must build your forces and reinforce your defensive structures quickly or attack offensively to reduce your opponent’s strength.  Attackers must be coordinated if they hope to succeed.

achievements.name: Builder and Destroyer
achievements.description: Few things are so satisfying as seeing the enemy’s wonder in flames, or defending your wonder to the last unit.  After ten Defend the Wonder battles you have certainly seen both.  Cheers to you!

achievements.name: Wonder Defender
achievements.description: You have demonstrated mastery of the Defend the Wonder style.  Cheers to you on your fiftieth challenge!

achievements.name: You were the Most Valuable Player!
achievements.description: You have earned your first MVP award.  The Most Valuable Player in an Age of Empires II battle has the highest total buildings razed and enemy units killed on the team.  Aggressive attacks and thorough elimination of enemy buildings will increase your chances of earning additional MVPs.   Congratulations!

achievements.name: Rising Star
achievements.description: You have been selected for the Most Valuable Player award twenty times.  You have demonstrated great skill in battle, and surpassed that by outperforming the other generals in your allegiance.  You are definitely a rising star in this elite group.  Congratulations!

achievements.name: Incredible Team Leader!
achievements.description: You have been selected for the Most Valuable Player award 100 times.  You have demonstrated great skill in battle, and surpassed that by outperforming the other generals in your allegiance.  You are definitely a rising star in this elite group.  Congratulations!

achievements.name: Champion of the Britons
achievements.description: You have led the Britons to victory ten times.  Fight on!

achievements.name: Defender of the Britons
achievements.description: Master of the Longbow Archers, you have led the Britons to victory fifty times.

achievements.name: Hero of the Britons
achievements.description: You have led the Britons to victory one hundred times! Your name will be listed among their greatest heroes.

achievements.name: Champion of the Franks
achievements.description: You have led the Franks to victory ten times.  Fight on!

achievements.name: Defender of the Franks
achievements.description: Master of the Heavy Calvary charge, you have led the Franks to victory fifty times.

achievements.name: Hero of the Franks
achievements.description: You have led the Franks to victory one hundred times! Your name will be listed among their greatest heroes.

achievements.name: Champion of the Goths
achievements.description: You have led the Goths to victory ten times.  Fight on!

achievements.name: Defender of the Goths
achievements.description: Master of the Huskarls, you have led the Goths to victory fifty times.

achievements.name: Hero of the Goths
achievements.description: You have led the Goths to victory one hundred times! Your name will be listed among their greatest heroes.

achievements.name: Champion of the Teutons
achievements.description: You have led the Teutons to victory ten times.  Fight on!

achievements.name: Defender of the Teutons
achievements.description: Master of the power of the garrison and well versed in defensive building, you have led the Teutons to victory fifty times.

achievements.name: Hero of the Teutons
achievements.description: You have led the Teutons to victory one hundred times! Your name will be listed among their greatest heroes.

achievements.name: Champion of the Japanese
achievements.description: You have led the Japanese to victory ten times.  Fight on!

achievements.name: Defender of the Japanese
achievements.description: Master of the Samurai, you have led the Japanese to victory fifty times.

achievements.name: Hero of the Japanese
achievements.description: You have led the Japanese to victory one hundred times! Your name will be listed among their greatest heroes.

achievements.name: Champion of the Chinese
achievements.description: You have led the Chinese to victory ten times.  Fight on!

achievements.name: Defender of the Chinese
achievements.description: Master of both the Chu Ko Nu crossbows and advanced learning, you have led the Chinese to victory fifty times.

achievements.name: Hero of the Chinese
achievements.description: You have led the Chinese to victory one hundred times! Your name will be listed among their greatest heroes.

achievements.name: Champion of the Byzantines
achievements.description: You have led the Byzantines to victory ten times.  Fight on!

achievements.name: Defender of the Byzantines
achievements.description: Master of the Cataphracts, you have led the Byzantines to victory fifty times.

achievements.name: Hero of the Byzantines
achievements.description: You have led the Byzantines to victory one hundred times! Your name will be listed among their greatest heroes.

achievements.name: Champion of the Persians
achievements.description: You have led the Persians to victory ten times.  Fight on!

achievements.name: Defender of the Persians
achievements.description: Master of the War Elephants, you have led the Persians to victory fifty times.

achievements.name: Hero of the Persians
achievements.description: You have led the Persians to victory one hundred times! Your name will be listed among their greatest heroes.

achievements.name: Champion of the Saracens
achievements.description: You have led the Saracens to victory ten times.  Fight on!

achievements.name: Defender of the Saracens
achievements.description: Master of the Mamelukes, you have led the Saracens to victory fifty times.

achievements.name: Hero of the Saracens
achievements.description: You have led the Saracens to victory one hundred times! Your name will be listed among their greatest heroes.

achievements.description: You have led the Vikings to victory ten times.  Fight on!

achievements.name: Defender of the Vikings
achievements.description: Master of the Berserker and the Longboat units, you have led the Vikings to victory fifty times.

achievements.name: Hero of the Vikings
achievements.description: You have led the Vikings to victory one hundred times! Your name will be listed among their greatest heroes.

achievements.name: Champion of the Mongols

achievements.description: Master of the Mangudai, you have led the Mongols to victory fifty times.

achievements.name: Hero of the Mongols

achievements.name: Champion of the Mayans
achievements.description: You have led the Mayans to victory ten times.  Fight on!

achievements.name: Defender of the Mayans
achievements.description: Master of the Plumed Archers, you have led the Mayans to victory fifty times.

achievements.name: Hero of the Mayans
achievements.description: You have led the Mayans to victory one hundred times! Your name will be listed among their greatest heroes.

achievements.name: Champion of the Huns
achievements.description: You have led the Huns to victory ten times.  Fight on!

achievements.name: Defender of the Huns
achievements.description: Master of the Tarkans, you have led the Huns to victory fifty times.

achievements.name: Hero of the Huns
achievements.description: You have led the Huns to victory one hundred times! Your name will be listed among their greatest heroes.

achievements.name: Champion of the Koreans
achievements.description: You have led the Koreans to victory ten times.  Fight on!

achievements.name: Defender of the Koreans
achievements.description: Master of the War Wagon, you have led the Koreans to victory fifty times.

achievements.name: Hero of the Koreans
achievements.description: You have led the Koreans to victory one hundred times! Your name will be listed among their greatest heroes.

achievements.name: Random Civilization Victory
achievements.description: Choosing ‘Random’ for your civilization is a good boast.  You are confidently telling the world that you can lead any civilization to victory!  Cheers to you!

achievements.name: Random Civilization Twenty Five Victories
achievements.description: After twenty five victories, you have shown that you truly can lead any civilization to glory.  You are truly a timeless commander!  (And you can probably converse with villagers in several languages.)

achievements.name: Random Civilization One Hundred Victories
achievements.description: After a hundred victories playing random civilizations, your reputation is truly secure.  Any civilization, any era, any map.  Just bring it!

achievements.name: Foe of the Britons
achievements.description: Through your various skills you have defeated the Britons in battle.

achievements.name: Enemy of the Britons
achievements.description: In twenty conflicts you have defeated the Britons.

achievements.name: Conqueror of the Britons
achievements.description: You have now defeated the Britons one hundred times in battle!

achievements.name: Foe of the Franks
achievements.description: Through your various skills you have defeated the Franks in battle.

achievements.name: Enemy of the Franks
achievements.description: In twenty conflicts you have defeated the Franks.

achievements.name: Conqueror of the Franks
achievements.description: You have now defeated the Franks one hundred times in battle!

achievements.name: Foe of the Goths
achievements.description: Through your various skills you have defeated the Goths in battle.

achievements.name: Enemy of the Goths
achievements.description: In twenty conflicts you have defeated the Goths.

achievements.name: Conqueror of the Goths
achievements.description: You have now defeated the Goths one hundred times in battle!

achievements.name: Conqueror of the Mongols
achievements.description: You have now defeated the Mongols one hundred times in battle!

achievements.description: Through your various skills you have defeated the Celts in battle.

achievements.name: Enemy of the Celts
achievements.description: In twenty conflicts you have defeated the Celts.

achievements.name: Conqueror of the Celts
achievements.description: You have now defeated the Celts one hundred times in battle!

achievements.description: Through your various skills you have defeated the Spanish in battle.

achievements.name: Enemy of the Spanish
achievements.description: In twenty conflicts you have defeated the Spanish.

achievements.name: Conqueror of the Spanish
achievements.description: You have now defeated the Spanish one hundred times in battle!

achievements.description: Through your various skills you have defeated the Aztecs in battle.

achievements.name: Enemy of the Aztecs
achievements.description: In twenty conflicts you have defeated the Aztecs.

achievements.name: Conqueror of the Aztecs
achievements.description: You have now defeated the Aztecs one hundred times in battle!

achievements.name: Enemy of the Mayans
achievements.description: In twenty conflicts you have defeated the Mayans.

achievements.name: Conqueror of the Mayans
achievements.description: You have now defeated the Mayans one hundred times in battle!

achievements.name: Enemy of the Huns
achievements.description: In twenty conflicts you have defeated the Huns.

achievements.name: Conqueror of the Huns
achievements.description: You have now defeated the Huns one hundred times in battle!

achievements.name: Foe of the Koreans
achievements.description: Through your various skills you have defeated the Koreans in battle.

achievements.name: Enemy of the Koreans
achievements.description: In twenty conflicts you have defeated the Koreans.

achievements.name: Conqueror of the Koreans
achievements.description: You have now defeated the Koreans one hundred times in battle!

achievements.name: Mysterious Foes
achievements.description: You have faced the unknown!  Playing against random opponents will expose you to a world’s worth of variety of units, tactics, and technologies.  Study their strengths and weaknesses to become a great leader.

achievements.name: Any Opponent
achievements.description: You have defeated random opponents twenty five times. Your legend grows greater with every victory.  Congratulations!

achievements.name: Random Master
achievements.description: You have faced the random opponents and defeated them two hundred and fifty times.  No civilization can find safety when they stand against you.  Congratulations!

achievements.name: Master of all Civilizations
achievements.description: You have won at least one victory against every civilization in Age of Empires II.

achievements.name: Skirmisher
achievements.description: You have killed over fifty units in  a single session.

achievements.name: Commander
achievements.description: You have killed over 500 units in a single session - your fame will spread from this point onward.

achievements.name: Emperor
achievements.description: You have killed over two thousand units in a single session.  You are a legend to both allies and enemies.

achievements.name: Just a flesh wound
achievements.description: Sometimes to win battles you have to make hard choices and sacrifices.   In this battle you lost 25 units to combat with the enemy.  Sometimes an outdated unit can get a needed boost of speed or armor with the right technology.   Get used to watching the alerts on your mini-map as well - a second attack is easy to miss once you are defending the first one. Use this tactic to your advantage as well.

achievements.name: And yet, I lived
achievements.description: Over one hundred of your units were lost in this battle - even with such great losses, if they were well used against the enemy you did the right thing.  Get used to studying the battle stats after each match with an opponent - did you have the right complementary mix of units?  Did you make your enemy pay for every one of your losses?  Every unit sacrificed is an opportunity to learn about your opponent.

achievements.name: Massacre
achievements.description: Two hundred of your units were lost in this conflict.  Sadly, not every battle can be a sweeping victory where everyone returns to the feast table to boast of their skill.   Sometimes, being a good general is about knowing when to throw everything against the enemy without reservation or hesitation.  Today you know how that feels.

achievements.name: Wololo - Enemy Unit Converted
achievements.description: Civilizations can be conquered with ideas as surely as with armaments.  You can celebrate your success this battle in converting enemy units.

achievements.name: Protecting the Priests
achievements.description: The communication of ideas and religion was a powerful force that changed empires in the Middle Ages.  Your conquest of 20 enemies in a single battle shows great skill at deploying and protecting the priests.

achievements.name: Master of Conversion
achievements.description: You have demonstrated mastery of the conversion strategies by converting over fifty enemy units in a single match.

achievements.name: No Backing Down
achievements.description: You razed 50 buildings in this campaign, your enemies will think twice before challenging you again.

achievements.name: Leave No Stone Unburned
achievements.description: In this campaign you razed over 100 buildings, your name is legend among your enemies.

achievements.name: Master of the Siege
achievements.description: No wall nor castle will stand in your way - you have clearly mastered the siege by razing over 250 buildings in one session.

achievements.name: Live to Rebuild
achievements.description: For some leaders, losing 15 buildings in a single session would be a reason to retreat and resign.  Not you.

achievements.name: Phoenix Rising
achievements.description: For some leaders, losing 50 buildings in a single session would be a crushing defeat - as long as you have wood and villagers you will carry on.

achievements.name: Live to Fight Another Day
achievements.description: Some leaders might aspire to build one hundred buildings in their entire reign.  You lost that many this day and fought on valiantly.  Stay strong!

achievements.name: Creation of your first Wonder of the World
achievements.description: You have constructed a wonder - a shining pinnacle of achievement for your civilization.  It is a beacon of hope to people everywhere, and if defended - a legacy of that achievement to stand the test of time.

achievements.name: Five Wonders
achievements.description: Few leaders can master both the economy needed to construct a wonder, let alone build a strong military or alliances to defend it.  As a veteran of Five Wonders you have demonstrated those skills.

achievements.name: Will Wonders Never Cease?
achievements.description: One Wonder is a pinnacle achievement for any ruler.  You have constructed fifty Wonders of the World through your many campaigns through history.  Clearly you are a master of building a strong economy and support structure.  You are clearly a leader in the Age of Empires.

achievements.name: First Castle Constructed
achievements.description: The Castle was the premiere fortification of the Medieval period.  Your legacy  in the future is assured.

achievements.name: Century Castle Celebration
achievements.description: In your various campaigns through history you have constructed over one hundred castles.

achievements.name: One Thousand Castles
achievements.description: On this day you have created your thousand’th castle.  Huzzah!

achievements.name: William Wallace Campaign Completed
achievements.description: “We come here with no peaceful intent, but ready for battle, determined to avenge our wrongs and set our country free. Let your masters come and attack us: we are ready to meet them beard to beard.” - (1297) William Wallace

achievements.name: Joan of Arc Campaign Completed
achievements.description: “Of the love or hatred God has for the English, I know nothing, but I do know that they will all be thrown out of France, except those who die there.” - Joan of Arc (Trial 1431)

achievements.name: Saladin Campaign Completed
achievements.description: By studying the campaigns of Salah al Din Yusuf ibn Ayyub, or 'Saladin' as he was known to the crusaders, you can know that there are many aspects to the great heroes of the Middle Ages. The lessons of his campaigns will guide you in your other conquests.

achievements.name: Genghis Khan Campaign Completed
achievements.description: His enemies know only the ruthlessness and speed of the great Khan’s conquests - but the greatest generals also know the tools of cooperation, alliance, and loyalty - these will serve you well in future campaigns.

achievements.name: Frederick Barbarossa Campaign Completed
achievements.description: In study of the campaigns of Frederick Barbarossa you learned the power of relics and of uniting an empire. Use this knowledge in your future conquests, but remember not to overextend yourself.

achievements.name: Attila the Hun Campaign Completed
achievements.description: Attila knew both great betrayal and great glory in his conquests against the Romans. Attila said: “It takes less courage to criticize the decisions of others than to stand by your own.” - Carry his example on to your other campaigns.

achievements.name: El Cid Campaign Completed
achievements.description: Throughout his conquests, El Cid was far more than a master at arms and noble, but was someone who could lead and unite the people. Even beyond his death, the legacy of his leadership was still more powerful than lesser rulers. Take his lessons with you on your own conquests.

achievements.name: Montezuma Campaign Completed
achievements.description: By following along with Cuauhtémoc in the battles against Cortés you have used alliance building and subtlety in addition to your skills in battle. Skillful use of forces and alliances can overcome the greatest odds. Remember these lessons in your next conquest.

achievements.name: Battles of the Conquerors Campaign Completed
achievements.description: Through study of these diverse battles and leaders you have mastered skills that will be useful in all of your future conquests. Fight with the piety of Charles Martel, the bravery of Alp Arslan, and the calculating tactics of Hideyoshi to ensure success in your campaigns.

achievements.name: Master of the Medieval World
achievements.description: You have successfully completed all of the story campaigns of Age of Empires II: The Age of Kings and Age of Empires II: The Conquerors Expansion. Successful leaders use many techniques to build their empires. Your careful study of the greatest of these men and women has given you new powers and abilities to build future empires.

achievements.name: Lightning General
achievements.description: You are an expert at the Turbo style, your decision-making under time pressure is legendary.  Congratulations to you, Lightning General!

achievements.name: Hero of the Spanish
achievements.description: You have led the Spanish to victory one hundred times! Your name will be listed among their greatest heroes.

achievements.name: Humanity Victorious
achievements.description: Congratulations! You have defeated a single CPU opponent (at moderate difficulty or higher).

achievements.name: Two Challenging
achievements.description: Congratulations! You have singly defeated two CPU opponents (at moderate difficulty or higher).

achievements.name: Triumphant Three
achievements.description: Congratulations! You have singly defeated three CPU opponents (at moderate difficulty or higher).

achievements.name: Four Scored
achievements.description: Congratulations! You have singly defeated four CPU opponents (at moderate difficulty or higher).

achievements.name: Five Golden Victories
achievements.description: Congratulations! You have singly defeated five CPU opponents (at moderate difficulty or higher).

achievements.name: Superior Six
achievements.description: Congratulations! You have singly defeated six CPU opponents (at moderate difficulty or higher).  Not many can claim this level of skill.

achievements.name: Seven Sealed Fates
achievements.description: Congratulations! You have singly defeated Seven CPU opponents (at moderate difficulty or higher).  World champions will often play against seven CPU opponents on Hard difficulty as a warm-up before tournaments.

achievements.name: Power of Persuasion
achievements.description: Every successful conversion is doubly beneficial to your team - you remove an enemy attacker and increase your own forces.  In your career you have successfully converted fifty units.

achievements.name: Embracing My Enemies
achievements.description: Over the span of your career, you have successfully converted over five hundred of your enemies to your cause!

achievements.name: Converting the World
achievements.description: You have dedicated yourself to bringing your civilization's religion to your foes.  Very few generals have the patience and wisdom to manage the priest units so effectively as you have.  This is indeed a day of celebration - you have converted one thousand opposing units in your career.

achievements.name: Burned
achievements.description: You have crumbled your five hundredth building into rubble…and you are just getting warmed up.   Congratulations!

achievements.name: Rubble Piles Everywhere
achievements.description: You have razed five thousand buildings in your long and illustrious military career!  If your reputation went up as quickly as you take buildings down you would be known world-wide.

achievements.name: No Stone Left Standing
achievements.description: You have razed ten thousand buildings in your long and illustrious military career!  You can unpack trebuchets in your sleep and you consider a dozen fire archers a pleasant introduction.  You are a legend!

achievements.name: A Thousand Heaps of Rubble
achievements.description: In your career you have lost over one thousand buildings.  Everything is a milestone, every win, every loss, and every building that falls.  Great generals count their losses and learn from them.

achievements.name: Ten Thousand Ruins
achievements.description: In your career you have lost over ten thousand buildings.  Buildings, like miles spent on horseback are excruciating at first but just mark the passage of time before long.  If you celebrate with a cake, just put one candle on it and start working on your next ten thousand.

achievements.name: Time to Stop Counting Buildings
achievements.description: Sure, generals say that every unit lost is mourned and every building razed is avenged - but after fifty thousand even the most obsessive counter gives up.  You have seen civilizatons rise and fall endlessly - it is time to stop counting the buildings.   Congratulations that you persevere, mighty leader.

achievements.name: Hosted First Game
achievements.description: You hosted a multiplayer game for the first time!

achievements.name: Dark Ages Rush or Early Adopter
Champion of the Incas
achievements.description: You have led the Incas to victory ten times.  Fight on!

achievements.name: Defender of the Incas
achievements.description: Master of the Kamayuk, you have led the Incas to victory fifty times.

achievements.name: Hero of the Incas
achievements.description: You have led the Incas to victory one hundred times! Your name will be listed among their greatest heroes.

achievements.description: Master of the Boyar, you have led the Slavs to victory fifty times.

achievements.name: Foe of the Incas
achievements.description: Through your various skills you have defeated the Incas in battle.

achievements.name: Enemy of the Incas
achievements.description: In twenty conflicts you have defeated the Incas.

achievements.name: Conqueror of the Incas
achievements.description: You have now defeated the Incas one hundred times in battle!

achievements.name: Foe of the Indians
achievements.description: Through your various skills you have defeated the Indians in battle.

achievements.name: Enemy of the Indians
achievements.description: In twenty conflicts you have defeated the Indians.

achievements.name: Conqueror of the Indians
achievements.description: You have now defeated the Indians one hundred times in battle!

achievements.name: Foe of the Italians
achievements.description: Through your various skills you have defeated the Italians in battle.

achievements.name: Enemy of the Italians
achievements.description: In twenty conflicts you have defeated the Italians.

achievements.name: Conqueror of the Italians
achievements.description: You have now defeated the Italians one hundred times in battle!

achievements.name: Foe of the Magyars
achievements.description: Through your various skills you have defeated the Magyars in battle.

achievements.name: Enemy of the Magyars
achievements.description: In twenty conflicts you have defeated the Magyars.

achievements.name: Conqueror of the Magyars
achievements.description: You have now defeated the Magyars one hundred times in battle!

achievements.name: Foe of the Slavs
achievements.description: Through your various skills you have defeated the Slavs in battle.

achievements.name: Enemy of the Slavs
achievements.description: In twenty conflicts you have defeated the Slavs.

achievements.name: Conqueror of the Slavs
achievements.description: You have now defeated the Slavs one hundred times in battle!

achievements.name: Alaric Campaign Completed
achievements.description: Through toil and perseverance, you have found a new home for Alaric's people, showing even mighty Rome that the Goths are a force to be reckoned with. Use your migratory skills and resilience to find a new home, recover, and succeed in your future aims even when the present looks bleak.

achievements.name: Dracula Campaign Completed
achievements.description: Vlad Dracula was a harsh, sometimes cruel ruler, but one could not argue the success of his methods. The only man of his time able to stand against the might of the Ottomans, Vlad showed that patriotism, charisma, and proper tactics could overcome all odds. Vlad also made a point to be strict but fair. Remember that advice when ruling your empire.

achievements.name: Bari Campaign Completed
achievements.description: The Nautikos family valued its home greatly, and its family history and heritage instilled a drive in its heirs to bring glory to their house. Their exploits, though somewhat forgotten, are a source of pride to their descendants. That pride is a fine attribute, but it is best tempered with prudence and ethic. Take that advice on your future conquests.

achievements.name: Sforza Campaign Completed
achievements.description: Rising from a lowly soldier to Duke of Milan, Sforza did more than make his father’s spirit proud. Use the traits of military leadership and tactics that you have learned in this campaign to find success in your future battles, and remember that it is better to be feared than loved. - Machiavelli (The Prince 1513)

achievements.name: El Dorado Campaign Completed
achievements.description: Orellana and his loyal followers faced more than their own fears and superstitions on their navigation of the Amazon. To overcome the adversity that stood in their way, they had to work as a unit and not as individuals. Remember those principles of unity and selflessness on your future campaigns.

achievements.name: Prithviraj Campaign Completed
achievements.description: The subject of veneration of many of his descendants, Prithviraj was shrewd, brave, honest, but also prone to emotion, taking many risks for the sake of love. Even in the sight of war and possible death, remember to enjoy your life to the fullest, for you only live once. A complete and moral life deserves the most remembrance.

achievements.name: Battles of the Forgotten Campaign Completed
achievements.description: Through your inquiry into the detail of some of the less-known but equally significant historical clashes of arms, you have shown that you are truly a master of the pen and the sword. Rule with the strength of the sons of Ragnar, the diplomatic aptitude of Khosrau Anushirvan, the steadfastness of Minamoto no Yoritomo, and the charisma of Osman Ghazi.

achievements.name: Master of the Forgotten World
achievements.description: You have successfully completed all of the story campaigns of Age of Empires II: The Forgotten Expansion. Through your trials and successes in these clashes of arms, you surely have mastered all spheres of empire-building and rule, and are ready to start building your own legend. “Cattle die, kindred die, every man is mortal: But the good name never dies of one who has done well.” -Havamal (Poetic Edda 1220)
